title: E-commerce Platform Modernization & AI Integration
project_overview: Transform RetailMax's legacy e-commerce platform into a modern, AI-powered shopping experience that drives higher conversion rates, improves customer engagement, and streamlines operations. The solution will integrate advanced recommendation engines, automated inventory management, and intelligent customer support.
problems_faced: Current platform is outdated with 40% cart abandonment rate, slow page load times (5+ seconds), poor mobile experience, manual inventory management causing stockouts, limited personalization leading to low customer engagement, and high customer service costs due to repetitive inquiries.
our_solution: Our modern e-commerce platform with AI integration will reduce cart abandonment by 60%, improve page load times to under 2 seconds, provide seamless mobile experience, implement intelligent inventory forecasting, deliver personalized product recommendations, and deploy AI-powered customer support that handles 80% of inquiries automatically.
objectives: Achieve 60% reduction in cart abandonment, 3x improvement in page load speed, 50% increase in mobile conversion rates, 90% inventory accuracy, 40% boost in average order value through personalization, and 70% reduction in customer service costs.
technical_requirements: React 18+, Next.js 14+, Node.js 18+, PostgreSQL 15+, Redis, AWS (EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, CloudFront), Stripe API, Shopify API, OpenAI GPT-4 API, TensorFlow, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD with GitHub Actions, monitoring with New Relic
